functions.tag: {CustomModelData:5,EntityTag:{Tags:[Sign,Spruce],Silent:1b,Size:0b,DeathLootTable:"item:item/magma_cube_spawn_egg/sign/break_cobweb",ArmorItems:[{id:"minecraft:stone",Count:1b,tag:{Data:{Text3:'{"text":"B","font":"sign","color":"white"}',Text4:'{"text":"⑤","font":"sign","color":"white","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"function item:sign/click/break_cobweb"}}}'}}},{},{},{}]},display:{Name:'{"translate":"粉砕の印板（蜘蛛の巣）","color":"#E0E0E0","bold":true,"italic":false}',Lore:['{"translate":"設置してクリックすると","color":"white","bold":false,"italic":false}','{"translate":"ちょっとの範囲にある%1$sを粉砕/回収する。","color":"white","bold":false,"italic":false,"with":[{"translate":"block.minecraft.cobweb","color":"#E0E0E0"}]}','{"translate":"【注意】スポナーには直接設置できません！","color":"#FF0000","bold":true,"italic":false}']}}
